thread.title: Bun B releases 'Crush City' to honor Houston Astros playoff team

author: chron.com
title: Bun B releases 'Crush City' to honor Houston Astros playoff team
text:

Photo: Bill Olive, For The Chronicle He stays TRILL Image 20 of 20 Bun B releases 'Crush City' to honor Houston Astros playoff team 1 / 20 Back to Gallery On Thursday morning Houston rap legend Bun B released a new song dedicated to the Houston Astros as they begin their playoff series against the Kansas City Royals tonight in Kansas City.
“Crush City” mentions nearly every Astros star and will likely sound pretty trill over the PA at Minute Maid Park when the team returns finally returns home this coming weekend.
The song’s title references Houston’s new nickname when the Astros bats are hot.
This is also likely the first time Dallas Keuchel and Colby Rasmus have been mentioned in a rap song to date.
“Hey Colby don’t dry your hair, bro,” Bun raps.
The rapper was in attendance on Monday night at Yankee Stadium as the Astros defeated the New York Yankees in the American League Wild Card game.
We can’t wait to hear the song blaring out of #ClubAstros as the beer and champagne flow.
